name: Captain Kid & The Magic Ship
description:
- NO SOUND / NO CONTROLLER SUPPORT-

[OBJECTIVE] 

Rebuild your boat to survive, gather resources out of water with your fish pole, load your cannon to destroy the enemies and rack up as many gold as you can

[CONTROLS]

LEFT AND RIGHT ARROWS - Movement

ENTER - Swap item

UP ARROW - Jump

UP AND DOWN ARROWS - Lower the hook when the fish pole is selected

MOUSE - Move the parrot and select blocks - 

MOUSECLICK - Hammer: Detach blocks / Wood: Build blocks / Iron: Reload the cannon

[CREDITS]

Art, code and design by Rafael Batista de Lima

[TO BE INCLUDED]

Open world navigation with random encounters

Different enemies ship sizes with different attacks and other enemies creatures

Have the ship layout influence environmental challenges as stormy cloud that destroy masts, have longer ships with more flags be faster etc

Build boats to send to nearby islands, anchor, harpoon, more cannons flags and more

Sword to fend off enemies trying to board the ship
